ygData.subject: Re: Shadowknights
ygData.msgSnippet: Xillith, ... On which server is your guild located? I have reached 7 summers, and am starting to consider joining a guild. ... Yes, Lord Innoruuk and the Queen
ygData.messageBody:
Xillith,

> If you play a female Dark Elf (me)
> JOIN THE BLOOD COVEN

On which server is your guild located? I have reached 7 summers, and am
starting to consider joining a guild.

> Kill proudly, kill often, and play a Dark Elf
> female because we are the coolest.

Yes, Lord Innoruuk and the Queen look kindly upon young maidens
spreading death and suffering to the unsuspecting masses!

Tiangwyn
